abstract: Parents of Kathryn Steinle file three separate claims seeking damages from federal and local authorities in San Francisco; family accuses agencies of negligence regarding murder of their daughter by suspect Juan Francisco Lopez-Sanchez, immigrant who has been deported five times before back to Mexico.
lead_paragraph: The parents of Kathryn Steinle of San Francisco, who officials say was fatally shot on July 1, said Tuesday that negligence and bureaucratic bungling by federal and local authorities had contributed to their daughter’s death.

headline.main: California: Parents Seek Damages In Killing at Pier
headline.print_headline: California: Parents Seek Damages in Killing at Pier
